A

addMarker(MarkerView) - Method in class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview.MarkerViewManager
Add a MarkerView to the map using MarkerView and LatLng.

C

com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview - package com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview
 

M

MarkerView - Class in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview
MarkerView class wraps a latitude-longitude pair with a Android SDK View.
MarkerView(LatLng, View) - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview.MarkerView
Create a MarkerView
MarkerView.OnPositionUpdateListener - Interface in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview
Callback definition that is invoked when position placement of a MarkerView is calculated.
MarkerViewManager - Class in com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview
Class responsible for synchronising views at a LatLng on top of a Map.
MarkerViewManager(MapView, MapboxMap) - Constructor for class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview.MarkerViewManager
Create a MarkerViewManager.

O

onCameraDidChange(boolean) - Method in class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview.MarkerViewManager

onUpdate(PointF) - Method in interface com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview.MarkerView.OnPositionUpdateListener
 

R

removeMarker(MarkerView) - Method in class com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.markerview.MarkerViewManager
Remove an existing markerView from the map.

S
